003.text: A little pig picked many beautiful flowers for his good friend.

004.text: He held the flowers in his hands and come to see his friend.

005.text: Suddenly, a strong wind blew over and swept away some flowers from his hands.

006.text: He looked at the bunch of flowers in his hand and though: 'Fortunately, there are still some leat.'

007.text: He keep going with the flowers.

008.text: Unexpectly, he fell heavily to the ground. the flowers also fell. Only some stems and leaves leat.

009.text: He looked at the stems and leaves in his hands and though again: 'Fortunately, there are still some stems and leaves leat!'

010.text: He continued going with the bunch of stems and leaves.
